title: UchihaSarada
author: UchihaSarada
content: With Proof of Work, no risk to see developers to mint new supply by a key board touch. New coin circulating supply will be released by miners from their mining process.Block reward halvings are great events to help miners and investors get more profit if they can hold their coins they got from previous epoch era.With block reward halving of Litecoin is coming, I did my own research and found some websites for Block reward halving countdown for Proof of Work altcoins.https://www.nicehash.com/countdownhttps://halvingdates.com/https://altcoinsbox.com/crypto-halving-dates-calendar/https://cointool.app/tools/halvingOnly about 104 more days till Litecoin halving date, what do you expect with Litecoin price on market in next three months?https://www.nicehash.com/countdown/ltc-halving-2023-08-06-11-00In its previous halving, Litecoin had a very good pump.

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: I made a thread similar to this on finding out which service out of these is the most reliable halving countdown: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5403419.msg60408999#msg60408999On June 21, 2022, these were the dates and the websites which they claimed for the halving:1. BuyBitcoinWorldwide - 2 April, 20242. Binance Academy - 30 April, 20243. Gate.io - 3 May, 20244. CoinGecko - 4 May, 20245. BitcoinBlockHalf - 4 May, 20246. Nicehash  - 31 May, 20247. CoinmarketCap - 1 June, 20248. CoinWarz - 3 June, 2024Now, today on 25th April 2023 after 10 months, this is what these websites say:1. BuyBitcoinWorldwide - April 6, 2024 (+4 days)2. Binance Academy - 30 April, 2024 (same)3. Gate.io - 28 April, 2024 (-5 days)4. CoinGecko - 28 April, 2024 (-6 days)5. BitcoinBlockHalf - 27 April, 2024 (-7 days)6. Nicehash  - Website Down7. CoinmarketCap - Page Removed8. CoinWarz - Apr 27, 2024 (-35 days)If we take an average date from these results, it will be 27-28th April 2024. Let's see how this goes in the future.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: I did create a thread about this same topic because of an article I read online and with the responses I got there I realized that all those websites are only just predicting the date and time the halving none of them knows the actual date of the halving. Quote from: UchihaSarada on April 25, 2023, 01:50:04 AMOnly about 104 more days till Litecoin halving date, what do you expect with Litecoin price on market in next three months?https://www.nicehash.com/countdown/ltc-halving-2023-08-06-11-00In its previous halving, Litecoin had a very good pump.Not the actual date, it might take longer time or occur quicker than expected.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: UchihaSarada on April 25, 2023, 01:50:04 AMWith Proof of Work, no risk to see developers to mint new supply by a key board touch.Take note that this only applies to Bitcoin and a few amply-decentralized altcoins. 99% of other altcoins that use proof of work or whatever consensus algorithm has risks of being altered simply due to the fact that 99% of other altcoins are very very centralized.
